content: designed and knitted to aid my love and obsession for mason jars big and small i knew i wasn t the only one that enjoys sipping their beverages from mason jars so i thought i would share the pattern with the world this project is perfect for using up those leftover little balls of yarn you have lying around the stash i know i definitely have a fair amount lurking around in my stash i ve given instructions for cozies for both the common pint size jar and the not so common in canada that is pint and half size jar although i see nothing wrong with using the pint sized cozy on the larger size because then you ll be able to see how much yumminess you have left in your jar **mason jar cozy 3 ways** include &hearts **the basic** perfect for using up the tidbits of yarn that you love so dearly &hearts **the ribbed** a simple step up from the basic &hearts **the convertible** not sure which size mason jar you use the most knit the convertible it s like having 2 cozies in 1
